events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but my package still hasn’t arrived, and the tracking info hasn’t updated in several days.
The customer’s message indicates a delivery delay, with references to late shipment and tracking issues.
Routing this case to the delivery support team to investigate the delayed shipment and tracking status.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your shipment hasn’t arrived yet. Let me check the status and see how we can help.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking number shown in your account, so we can investigate?
Sure, my order number is 4532167 and the tracking number is ZX987654321. The tracking status hasn’t changed since last week.
Thank you for the info. We’ve contacted the courier and expedited the investigation. You should receive an update within 48 hours.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I appreciate you looking into this so promptly.
The courier confirmed the package was delivered today. Please check your delivery area for the parcel.
We wanted to check that you have received your package and that everything is in order now.
Yes, I found the package at my doorstep. Thank you for resolving this quickly and keeping me updated.
Closing the case as the delivery issue has been resolved and the customer has confirmed receipt.
